ctx: intros c a b Ha Hb.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros c a b Ha Hb.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros c a b Ha Hb. apply (gt_trans _ (div2 c)). - apply (gt_trans _ (a + b)). + apply (plus_gt_compat_l a b (div2 c)). apply (plus_gt_compat_l b c (div2 c)). auto. + apply (plus_gt_compat_l (div2 c) c c). apply le_gt_trans with (div2 c). apply gt_S_le. apply div2_correct'. - apply (gt_trans _ (div2 c)). apply gt_S_le. apply div2_correct'. apply gt_asym. apply gt_not_le. auto.
